data.title: Lewis Name Meaning
meta_keywords: What is the meaning of Lewis
data.meta_description: Lewis name meaning,  baby Boy name Lewis meaning,etymology, history, presonality details. Lewis  Rhyming, similar names and popularity.
data.text:
Character Analysis of Lewis : Persons with the name Lewis, are Charismatic, cheeky and sociable fun-lovers, adaptable to change and adore colorful bright surroundings. With a gift of communication skills they are inspiration, cheerful optimism and joy. They loves life and wants and needs to share their enthusiasm with those around them. They tend to be the 'joker' and have a wonderful sense of humour.

Love Life of Lewis : Persons are, sometimes too idealistic and attracted to Persons who have problems and looking for a support.

Name Letter Analysis of Lewis

L : Persons are very heady, and tend to over think rather than experience lifeE : Persons are freedom-loving, sensual and enthusiasticW : Persons think from the gut and have a great sense of purposeI : Persons are a compassionate person who feels things deeplyS : Persons are a real charmer

Acoording to vedic astrology , Rashi for the name Lewis is Mesh and Moon sign associated with the name Lewis is Aries.

The name Lewis has Fire element. Mars is the Ruling Planet for the name Lewis . The name Lewis having moon sign as Aries is represented by The Ram and considered as Cardinal .

Normally, people with the name Lewis are energetic, courageous and determined.

Other name options, having Aries moon sign are name starting with : Chu, Cho, La, Che,Lee, Lu, Le, Lo,Li, A, I,Ee.
